content: with k2 instead of k3 p1 repeat for n2 round 3 p1 k2 *p3 k1 sl1p wyif k1 p3 k3 repeat from * 2 more times to 3 sts before end ending with k2 instead of k3 p1 repeat for n2 round 4 reprnd 2 legend knit purl sl1p wyif crate socks pattern version 1 0 | copyright © knitsbylois 2025 this pattern is for personal and non-commercial use only do not sell reproduce distribute or use for ai training page 5 heel flap note n1 will hold the instep and gusset stitches n2 will hold the heel flap gusset and sole stitches heel flap will be worked flat on n2 only work woven ribbing pattern round 1 on n1 then rest all sts from n1 on the cable or a stitch holder we will work flat for heel flap on the 27 31 35 39 sts on n2 as follows row 1 rs sl1p wyib *k1 sl1p wyif repeat from * 12 14 16 18 more times k2 turn the work row2ws sl1p wyif p to end turn the work row 3 sl1p wyib *sl1p wyif k1 repeat from * 13 15 17 19 more times turn the work note the first two stitches are slip stitches keep the gauge even to prevent the fabric from curling row 4 reprow 2 repeat row 1-4 for 6 7 8 9 more times then row 1 once turn the work there are 14 16 18 20 slipped sts on each side heel turn row 1 ws sl1p wyif p15 17 19 21 p2tog p1 there are 8 10 12 14 sts unworked turn the work 1 st decrease d row 2 rs sl1p wyib k6 ssk k1 there are 8 10 12 14 sts unworked turn the work 1 st decrease d note try one move ssk for improved look you can refer to the video tutorial one move ssk on page 2 row 3 sl1p wyif p to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn the work 1 st decrease d row 4 sl1p wyib k to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn the work 1 st decrease d repeat row 3-4 for 3 4 5 6 more times all sts should be worked after finishing the last row 4 don t turn the work end with rs facing there are 17 19 21 23 heel sts on n2 15 17 19 21 slipped sts on each side crate socks pattern version 1 0 | copyright © knitsbylois 2025 this pattern is for personal and non-commercial use only do not sell reproduce distribute or use for ai training page 6 gusset note optional instructions in square brackets are for preventing gaps and should be worked once do not repeat them in subsequent rounds see video tutorial correcting gaps in socks on page 2 set-up round continue with n2 pick up and knit 15 17 19 21 sts from slipped sts on the edge of the heel flap there are
